changeSet.sql: update financemain set GrcPeriodEndDate = FinstartDate where GrcPeriodEndDate IS NULL;

changeSet.author: satish
changeSet.sql: update smtparameters set sysparmlength=3 where sysparmcode='EOD_THREAD_COUNT'

changeSet.author: satish
changeSet.sql: Delete from SMTparameters where SYSPARMCODE='SUSP_CHECK_REQ'; INSERT INTO SMTparameters (SYSPARMCODE, SYSPARMDESC, SYSPARMTYPE, SYSPARMMAINT, SYSPARMVALUE, SYSPARMLENGTH, SYSPARMDEC, SYSPARMDESCRIPTION, VERSION, LASTMNTBY, LASTMNTON, RECORDSTATUS, WORKFLOWID) VALUES ('SUSP_CHECK_REQ', 'Suspense Check Require', 'int', '0', '0', '1', '0', 'Suspense Check Require. 0: NO 1: YES', '1', '1000', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'Approved', '0');

changeSet.author: satish
changeSet.sql: update Postings set PostCategory=0 where PostCategory is null;

changeSet.author: satish
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO SMTparameters (SYSPARMCODE, SYSPARMDESC, SYSPARMTYPE, SYSPARMMAINT, SYSPARMVALUE, SYSPARMLENGTH, SYSPARMDEC, SYSPARMDESCRIPTION, VERSION, LASTMNTBY, LASTMNTON, RECORDSTATUS, WORKFLOWID) VALUES ('EOD_CHUNK_SIZE', 'Eod Chunk Size', 'int', '1', '5', '3', '0', 'Eod Chunk Size', '1', '1000', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'Approved', '0');

changeSet.author: satish
changeSet.sql: update eodconfig set InExtMnth=0 where InExtMnth is null;

changeSet.author: satish
changeSet.createView: SELECT T1.EodConfigId, T1.ExtMnthRequired, T1.MnthExtTo, T1.Active,T1.InExtMnth,T1.PrvExtMnth , T1.Version , T1.LastMntBy, T1.LastMntOn,T1.RecordStatus, T1.RoleCode, T1.NextRoleCode, T1.TaskId, T1.NextTaskId, T1.RecordType, T1.WorkflowId FROM EodConfig T1

changeSet.author: satish
changeSet.createView:
SELECT T1.EodConfigId, T1.ExtMnthRequired, T1.MnthExtTo, T1.Active,T1.InExtMnth,T1.PrvExtMnth , T1.Version , T1.LastMntBy, T1.LastMntOn,T1.RecordStatus, T1.RoleCode, T1.NextRoleCode, T1.TaskId, T1.NextTaskId, T1.RecordType, T1.WorkflowId FROM EodConfig_Temp T1 UNION ALL
SELECT T1.EodConfigId, T1.ExtMnthRequired, T1.MnthExtTo, T1.Active,T1.InExtMnth,T1.PrvExtMnth , T1.Version , T1.LastMntBy, T1.LastMntOn,T1.RecordStatus, T1.RoleCode, T1.NextRoleCode, T1.TaskId, T1.NextTaskId, T1.RecordType, T1.WorkflowId FROM EodConfig T1 WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM EodConfig_TEMP WHERE EodConfigId = T1.EodConfigId)

changeSet.author: satish
changeSet.sql: alter table finpftdetails drop constraint FK_FINPFTDETAIL_BMTCUSTSTSCODE;

changeSet.author: satish
changeSet.sql: update ERRORDETAILS set ERRORSEVERITY='E' where ERRORCODE='60311';

insert.column: Mandate start date {0} should be before first repayment date {1}.

changeSet.author: satish
satish
changeSet.sql: insert into SMTparameters values('ACCRUAL_CAL_ON','Accrual Calculated on SOD(1) or EOD(0)','int',0,'0',1,0,null,null,'Accrual Calculate on SOD or EOD',1,1000,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'Approved','','','','','',0);
